title: dodge timer when someone else dodged the game on blood moon game mode
body: i got a dodge timer when someone else dodged the game on blood moon game mode. anyone else face this?

replies.body: I wasn't able to find a dodge here, but my info may not be up to date.  Are you grouped with anyone who dodged?  If you are in are in a premade then you'd have to share that the [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) timer.  I hope that helps!

Riot, this game mode champ select is tilting everyone so hard. It's not dodging. Champs don't auto lock once the timer goes down, which I believe is so retarded! 3 times... Got blocked for trying to look up builds and masteries for certain champs I'm not the best at... Please fix this.

Getting left behind, losing sync, and being unable to change masteries all sound like an unstable connection with champion select.  Hiccups or a weak connection can result in these cases, so it would be a good idea to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  This will help tune up your network and help prevent cases like this from happening.  I hope that helps!
not grouped with anyone. i was about to lock in when 'xyz left lobby' came up and i was returned to game mode selection. then timer for 5mins 30sec
I think this issue is not locking in your champion--it's counting as a dodge
don't the champions auto lock in after countdown is done? at least that's how it was earlier
